divs: Sighting DetailsSleeping in backyard under stars looking at stars before falling asleep. Observed two starlike light flying parallel to eachother northward. Two points of light then executed sudden changes In direction. One immediately was heading roughly northwest and the other northeast. Lights eventually faded out of view due to distance from viewer while on paths that were a perfect right angle from eachother. Objects appeared to be in the upper atmosphere and like points of light but not bright due to distance away. Objects were not satellites because of their sudden directional change.
Summary: Two lights traveling traveling north parallel then both turn abruptly 45 degrees away from eachother and continue respective straight line paths
trends: There have been 30 other sightings in Boulder
There were no other sightings in Boulder on or around May 27th 2012
